title: Bash Scripting
description: Create a bash script that loops through files in current directory
command: for file in *; do echo $file; done
hint: Use a for loop with wildcard expansion

title: Advanced AWK
description: Use AWK to print the third column of a CSV file

title: Sed Stream Editor
description: Replace all occurrences of 'old' with 'new' in a file using sed
hint: Use sed with substitution pattern s/pattern/replacement/g

title: Complex Pipe Chain
description: Find the top 10 largest files in /var and sort by size
hint: Combine find, sort, and head commands with pipes

title: Docker Container Management
hint: Use docker ps to list containers

title: Systemd Service Creation
description: Create a systemd service file for a custom application
hint: After creating service file, reload systemd daemon

title: Kernel Module Management
description: List all currently loaded kernel modules
hint: Use lsmod to list kernel modules

title: Network Packet Analysis
description: Capture network packets on interface eth0
hint: Use tcpdump with -i flag for interface

title: LVM Management
description: Display all logical volumes in the system
hint: Use lvdisplay for logical volume information

title: Performance Tuning
description: Display CPU information including cache sizes
hint: Use lscpu for detailed CPU information

title: Process Priority
description: Change the nice value of a running process
hint: Use renice command to adjust process priority

title: RAID Configuration
description: Check the status of software RAID arrays

title: SELinux Management
description: Check the current SELinux enforcement mode
hint: Use getenforce to check SELinux status
